question: when does south by southwest start in austin texas
chain_of_thought_result: South by Southwest (SXSW) typically takes place in March each year. For the specific dates in a given year, you would need to check the official SXSW website or announcements, as the exact dates can vary from year to year. For example, in 2023, SXSW was held from March 10 to March 19. Always verify the current year's dates for the most accurate information.
